summary: REAR GREASE SEALS WERE NOT INSTALLED BY THE MANUFACTURER CAUSING THE WHEEL BEARINGS TO DISINTEGRATE.  AFTER USING THE BOAT TRAILER FOUR TIMES THE WHEEL BEARINGS DISINTEGRATED.  DURING REPAIR THE CONSUMER FOUND OUT THAT THE GREASE SEALS WERE NOT INSTALLED BY THE MANUFACTURER.  THE CONSUMER CONTACTED THE MANUFACTURER WHO ASKED THE CONSUMER TO SUBMIT THE BILL FOR REIMBURSEMENT.  THE CONSUMER HAS NOT HEARD FROM THE MANUFACTURER REGARDING THE REFUND (HOT SUMMER INDUSTRIES BOAT TRAILER).  *NM
